Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: where
Description: For each name, indicate how it should be interpreted

Arguments.Name: w
Arguments.Description: For each name, print 'name: word', where 'word' is the kind of command

Arguments.Name: p
Arguments.Description: Do a path search for the name, even if it's an alias/function/builtin

Arguments.Name: m
Arguments.Description: The arguments are taken as patterns (pattern characters must be quoted)

Arguments.Name: s
Arguments.Description: If the pathname contains symlinks, print the symlink-free name as well

Arguments.Name: S
Arguments.Description: Print intermediate symlinks and the resolved name

Arguments.Name: x
Arguments.Description: Expand tabs when outputting shell function
